keep.name: docs:refresh
keep.command: npm run docs:systemmap && npm run docs:indexes

keep.name: system:map
keep.command: npm run docs:systemmap && echo "üìç System map generated in docs/SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE_MAP.md"

keep.name: run:min+commit
keep.command: npm run -s run:min && scripts/post_run_commit.sh "feat(run): QA gen & audit update"

keep.name: run:min+autocommit
keep.command: AUTO_COMMIT=true npm run -s run:min && scripts/post_run_commit.sh "feat(run): QA gen & audit update"

keep.name: guard:all
keep.command: npm run guard:env && npm run guard:toolchain && npm run smoke && npm run guard:prod && npm run guard:git && npm run schema && npm run guard:no-direct-http && npm run regression:mini

keep.name: preflight
keep.command: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && node dist/scripts/preflight_pack.js --profile stage --budget-smoke 2.00 --budget-full 50.00 --run-tags preflight

keep.name: ci:quality
keep.command: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && (npm run test || echo 'Tests failed but continuing for CI/CD consistency')

keep.name: ci:strict
keep.command: npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test && npm run smoke && npm run schema

keep.name: commit
keep.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: automated commit with Claude Code" && git push

keep.name: sync:simple
keep.command: git add . && git commit -m "sync: update with latest changes" && git push && echo "‚úÖ ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ ÎèôÍ∏∞Ìôî ÏôÑÎ£å"

keep.name: ship:docs
keep.command: npm run docs:refresh && npm run handoff

keep.name: ship:pre
keep.command: npm run ci:strict && npm run verify:obs && npm run verify:handoff && npm run verify:export

keep.name: ship:fast
keep.command: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run smoke && echo 'üöÄ Fast ship complete - APM tests bypassed'

keep.name: ship:legacy
keep.command: npm run ship:pre && npm run handoff && npm run export

keep.name: verify:all
keep.command: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run guard:all

remove.name: replit:install
remove.command: cd backend && npm install && cd ../apps/fe-web && npm install

analysis.name: replit:install
analysis.command: cd backend && npm install && cd ../apps/fe-web && npm install

analysis.name: docs:refresh
analysis.command: npm run docs:systemmap && npm run docs:indexes

analysis.name: system:map
analysis.command: npm run docs:systemmap && echo "üìç System map generated in docs/SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE_MAP.md"

analysis.name: run:min+commit
analysis.command: npm run -s run:min && scripts/post_run_commit.sh "feat(run): QA gen & audit update"

analysis.name: run:min+autocommit
analysis.command: AUTO_COMMIT=true npm run -s run:min && scripts/post_run_commit.sh "feat(run): QA gen & audit update"

analysis.name: guard:all
analysis.command: npm run guard:env && npm run guard:toolchain && npm run smoke && npm run guard:prod && npm run guard:git && npm run schema && npm run guard:no-direct-http && npm run regression:mini

analysis.name: preflight

analysis.name: ci:quality
analysis.command: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && (npm run test || echo 'Tests failed but continuing for CI/CD consistency')

analysis.name: ci:strict
analysis.command: npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run test && npm run smoke && npm run schema

analysis.name: commit
analysis.command: git add . && git commit -m "feat: automated commit with Claude Code" && git push

analysis.name: ship:docs

analysis.name: ship:fast
